name: Clichepunk 2077
description:
Loading Takes a While.

Clichepunk 2077 is an open world adventure game that brings nothing new to the genre!

It is more a technology experiment than a game, but it is fully playable with some quests.

It was made for GitHub GameOff 2022. An annual 1 month game coding competition.  I again tried to bite off more than I could chew, but this year I didn't make myself ill trying to hit the deadline; I was ill to begin with and then just couldn't complete my original ambition!  Next year I'll have to try to keep my ambition in check and go for something simpler!

Anyway as an experimental foray into some new ideas it is an interesting project.  Even if as a game, it probably won't rank that highly in the GameOff results.

Controls: WASD to move
Hold SPACE to run.
